column2: The  Petitioners were  denied  the  opportunity to  respond  to/contradict  the
evidence against them nor to  defend their case
Copies of media publications were  not made  available  to  the  Petitioners
even prior to preparing written submissions
The position of the  1st  to  5th  Respondents  that there  is no  requirement to
provide copies of media publications to the Petitioners is flawed

There  was  apparent  bias  on 
the  part  of  the  disciplinary  committee
Petitioners were not given an opportunity to  defend their case
